mainMenu.title: PC GAFFER
mainMenu.saveProgress: Save your progress in the cloud
mainMenu.reachChampions: Reach Champions League from the bottom
mainMenu.guestNotice: Log in to save your progress in the cloud
mainMenu.tribute: The beautiful game, managed by you
mainMenu.deleteWarning: ⚠️ Starting a new game will delete current progress

edition.title: Edition Mode
edition.subtitle: Customize team and player names with community packs
edition.submitDesc: Create your own pack and submit it for review. It will be visible once approved.
edition.submittedSuccess: Pack submitted for review. It will be visible once the admin approves it.
edition.noPacksHint: Packs will appear here once approved
edition.warning: Applying or removing a pack will delete all saved games. Game data will reload with the new names.
edition.confirmApplyDesc: All saved games (career and time trial) will be deleted. Team and player names will be updated.
edition.confirmRemoveDesc: All saved games will be deleted and default names will be restored.
edition.offline: No internet connection. Connect to submit the pack.

office.title: Office
office.playersInjured: You have {{count}} injured player{{count, plural, one {} other {s}}} in your starting lineup
office.stillPlay: Do you want to continue with the match?
office.checkFormation: Go to Formation and substitute the injured players before continuing.
office.notEnoughPlayers: You don't have enough players to form a team
office.seasonEndedAfterWeeks: The season has ended after {{weeks}} simulated weeks.
office.onlyHavePlayers: You only have {{count}} players. You need a minimum of 11 to play.
office.goToTransfersWarning: Go to the transfer market and sign players before continuing. If you try to simulate again without having 11 players, you will lose the game.

formation.title: Formation
formation.tacDefensiveDetail: Strong vs Balanced · Weak vs Possession and Attacking
formation.tacAttackingDetail: Strong vs Defensive · Weak vs Counter and Press
formation.tacPossessionDesc: Control the ball and tire them out
formation.tacPossessionDetail: Strong vs Counter · Weak vs High Press
formation.tacCounterDesc: Give up the ball, hit on the break
formation.tacCounterDetail: Strong vs Attacking and Press · Weak vs Possession
formation.noStatsYet: No stats yet - play matches to generate data

plantilla.title: Squad
plantilla.sellNote: The player will appear on the market. Other teams can make offers.
plantilla.unlistQuestion: This player is currently on the transfer list. Do you want to remove them from the market?
plantilla.unlistNote: Will stop receiving offers from other teams.
plantilla.severanceWarning: You must pay the severance for the remaining {{years}} year(s) of contract.
plantilla.moraleWarning: This may affect the dressing room morale
plantilla.insufficientFunds: You don't have enough money for the severance
plantilla.loanedBy: Player loaned by {{team}} · Cannot sell or release
plantilla.cannotRenew: Player doesn't need renewal (more than 2 years left)

transfers.title: Transfers
transfers.preseasonMessage: It's preseason. Take advantage and sign players before the league starts!
transfers.marketAlwaysOpen: The market is always open. Sign, loan and negotiate whenever you want.
transfers.noInterestYet: No club has shown interest in your players... yet.
transfers.noActiveOffersMsg: You have no active offers or loans. Search for players to strengthen your team!
transfers.tickerDefault: Transfer market active | Stay tuned for updates
transfers.blockedUntilNextSeason: You won't be able to negotiate with this player until next season
transfers.offerHint: Response will arrive after simulating a match. The amount is reserved from your budget.
transfers.freeAgentInfo: No club negotiation needed. Negotiate directly with the player by offering a signing bonus and salary.
transfers.preContractInfo: Their contract expires soon. You can negotiate directly without paying a transfer fee. They'll join your team when their contract ends.
transfers.playerEvaluating: The player is evaluating your offer...
transfers.noAgreementReached: No agreement was reached with the player
transfers.teamLevelNotConvincing: Not convinced by the team's level
transfers.overallOfferNotConvincing: Not convinced by the overall offer
transfers.needsMoreMoney: Needs more money to compensate for the club's level
transfers.wantsFinancialImprovement: Wants a financial improvement to accept the move
transfers.playerJoined: {{name}} is a new player. Bonus: {{bonus}}, Salary: {{salary}}/yr
transfers.insufficientForLoanFee: You need {{amount}} for the loan fee
transfers.noLoanPurchaseOption: This loan has no purchase option
transfers.noSentOffersDesc: You have no active offers or loans. Find players to strengthen your team!
transfers.preseasonMsg: We're in preseason. Sign players before the league starts!
transfers.responseAfterMatch: The response will arrive after simulating a match. The amount is reserved from your budget.
transfers.tickerMsg: Transfer market active | Stay tuned for updates
transfers.persDescAmbitious: Wants to play at top clubs
transfers.persDescLoyal: Very unlikely to leave their club
transfers.persDescHomesick: Prefers to stay close to home

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.noSouthAmericanMatches: No South American matches this matchday

leagueTable.title: League Table
leagueTable.noData: No data available for this league.
leagueTable.noDataHint: Data will be generated as the season progresses.

facilities.title: Facilities
facilities.subtitle: Upgrade your club to compete at the highest level
facilities.chooseSpecDesc: Choose specialization (will be locked until next season)

stadium.title: Stadium
stadium.priceLocked: Price fixed for this season. Only for non-subscribers.
stadium.setPriceBeforeLeague: Price per match for non-subscribers. Set before the league starts.
stadium.onlyTicketsSold: Only tickets sold (without subscribers). Collected at the end of the season.
stadium.poorGrassWarning: Poor condition increases injuries for YOUR players
stadium.sellStadiumName: Sell the stadium name for annual income
stadium.upgradeForSponsors: Improve your stadium to attract sponsors
stadium.generateExtraIncome: Generate extra income (requires 2 weeks between events)
stadium.repairGrassBeforeEvents: Repair the grass before organizing events
stadium.seasonTicketsMessage: {{count}} subscribers · €{{price}} = {{total}} (will be collected at end of season)
stadium.stadiumNameRestored: The stadium recovers its original name. Penalty paid: €{{amount}}M
stadium.stadiumNameRestoredFree: The stadium recovers its original name
stadium.penaltyRequired: You need €{{amount}}M to pay the penalty for cancelling the contract.

training.title: Training Intensity
training.intensitySetDesc: The team will train with {{intensity}} intensity throughout the season.
training.selectIntensity: Select intensity for the entire season
training.canChangeNext: You can change it at the start of next season

light.name: Light
light.description: Lower progression, fewer injuries. Ideal for veterans.

settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteMessage: This action will delete your saved game and cannot be undone.
settings.difficultyEasyDesc: Less aggressive AI, more initial money

saveSlots.selectOrCreate: Select a saved game or create a new one
saveSlots.chooseSlot: Choose a slot to save your progress

contrarreloj.title: Race Against Time Mode
contrarreloj.objective: Objective: Reach Champions League from the bottom
contrarreloj.objectiveMessage: Objective: win the {{competition}} with {{team}} in the fewest seasons. The clock is ticking!

contrarrelojSetup.title: RACE AGAINST TIME
contrarrelojSetup.subtitle: Can you reach the top of European/South American football?
contrarrelojSetup.winChampions: Win the Champions League or Copa Libertadores
contrarrelojSetup.fired: You get fired or your budget goes negative

seasonEnd.title: Season End
seasonEnd.eliminated: The team has been eliminated from the playoff

objectives.title: Objectives
objectives.atRiskWarning: at risk. Review your strategy to avoid penalties.
objectives.objectivesWillGenerate: Season objectives will be generated when the league starts.

objDescs.championsQualification: Finish in the top 4 to qualify for the Continental Champions Cup
objDescs.europeanQualification: Finish in the top 6 to qualify for European competition
objDescs.topHalf: Finish in the top half of the table
objDescs.avoidRelegation: Stay up by finishing outside the relegation zone
objDescs.promotion: Earn promotion to the higher division
objDescs.goalDifference: End the season with more goals scored than conceded
objDescs.financialStability: Don't end the season in the red
objDescs.youthDevelopment: Give minutes to young players from the academy

renewals.title: Contract Renewals
renewals.subtitle: Manage your squad contracts
renewals.noRenewalNeeded: No renewal needed (more than 2 years contract)
renewals.playerWillSign: Player will sign the new contract
renewals.playerNotInterested: Player is not interested in renewing with these conditions.
renewals.playerUnhappyWantsOut: Player is unhappy and wants to leave the club

competitions.title: Competitions
competitions.qualifyForEuropean: Qualify in league to play European competitions
competitions.qualifyForSouthAmerican: Qualify in league to play Copa Libertadores or Sudamericana
competitions.cupWillStart: The Cup will start during the season

ranking.title: Ranking
ranking.subtitle: Race Against Time Mode · Best Times
ranking.confirmClear: Delete all records? This action cannot be undone.
ranking.noRecordsDesc: Complete Race Against Time mode to appear in the ranking.

contrarrelojEnd.noPlayers: ⚠️ You don't have enough players to form a team.
contrarrelojEnd.fired: 🚫 The board has dispensed with your services.

managerFired.title: FIRED
managerFired.defaultReason: The board has decided to relieve you of your coaching duties.
managerFired.bankruptReason: The board has fired you for driving the club into bankruptcy.

auth.accountCreated: Account created! Check your email to verify your account.
auth.passwordResetSent: Password reset email sent. Check your inbox.
auth.emailNotVerified: Email not yet verified. Check your inbox.
auth.verificationSent: We've sent a verification email to:
auth.clickLinkToActivate: Click the link in the email to activate your account.
auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in

europe.title: European Competitions
europe.notQualified: You are not qualified for European competitions this season.
europe.qualificationHint: Finish in the top positions of your league to qualify.

southAmerica.title: South American Competitions
southAmerica.notQualified: You are not qualified for continental competitions this season.
southAmerica.qualificationHint: Finish in the top positions of your league to qualify.

contrarrelojProgress.howManySeasonsQuestion: How many seasons will you need?

gameMessages.offerExpiredContent: The offer from {{team}} for {{player}} has expired
gameMessages.directChampion: {{team}} wins Apertura and Clausura and is direct champion of {{league}}.
gameMessages.aperturaClausuraFinalContent: Your team will play the {{league}} final! {{apertura}} (Apertura) vs {{clausura}} (Clausura).
gameMessages.transferCompleteContent: {{player}} is a new member of the team! Cost: {{cost}}
gameMessages.transferCompleteCounterContent: {{player}} is a new member of the team! Counter offer accepted: {{cost}}
gameMessages.medicalTreatment: {{player}} received treatment. Injury reduced from {{oldWeeks}} to {{newWeeks}} weeks. Cost: {{cost}}
gameMessages.offerExpiredRefund: Your offer for {{player}} has expired without response. {{amount}} refunded
gameMessages.counterOfferExpiredContent: Counter offer for {{player}} has expired. {{amount}} refunded
gameMessages.counterOfferRejectedContent: {{team}} rejects your counter offer of {{amount}} for {{player}}
gameMessages.cupByeContent: Your team advances directly to the next round (bye)

proManager.title: ProManager
proManager.chooseCountry: Choose a country to start your career
proManager.noOffers: No offers available. Try another country.

board.happy: The board is delighted with your work.
board.neutral: The board is monitoring your progress.
board.concerned: The board is starting to question your decisions.
board.warning: ⚠️ The board is considering your dismissal!
board.fired: The board has decided to relieve you of your duties.

seasonEnd.title: End of Season
seasonEnd.close: Close to the objective, but not enough.
seasonEnd.failed: You failed to meet the board's objective.
seasonEnd.noExternalOffers: No external offers at this time.

ranked.noMatchesYet: You haven't played any ranked matches yet.
ranked.aboveRival: You are ahead of your rival
ranked.exitWarning: You have an active ranked match. If you leave, you'll lose by disconnection.
